verses.verse: וַיִּפְקֹ֣ד <WH6485> numbered דָּוִ֔ד <WH1732> And David אֶת־ <WH853> הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> the people אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who אִתּ֑וֹ <WH854> for וַיָּ֣שֶׂם <WH7760> that [were] with him and set עֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <WH5921> over שָׂרֵ֥י <WH8269> captains אֲלָפִ֖ים <WH505> of thousands וְשָׂרֵ֥י <WH8269> and captains מֵאֽוֹת׃ <WH3967> of hundreds

וַיְשַׁלַּ֨ח <WH7971> sent forth דָּוִ֜ד <WH1732> And David אֶת־ <WH853> הָעָ֗ם <WH5971> of the people הַשְּׁלִשִׁ֤ית <WH7992> a third part בְּיַד־ <WH3027> under the hand יוֹאָב֙ <WH3097> of Joab וְ֠הַשְּׁלִשִׁית <WH7992> and a third part בְּיַ֨ד <WH3027> under the hand אֲבִישַׁ֤י <WH52> of Abishai בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son צְרוּיָה֙ <WH6870> of Zeruiah אֲחִ֣י <WH251> brother יוֹאָ֔ב <WH3097> Joab's וְהַ֨שְּׁלִשִׁ֔ת <WH7992> and a third part בְּיַ֖ד <WH3027> under the hand אִתַּ֣י <WH863> of Ittai הַגִּתִּ֑י <WH1663> the Gittite ס וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> And the king אֶל־ <WH413> to הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> unto the people יָצֹ֥א <WH3318> I will surely אֵצֵ֛א <WH3318> go forth גַּם־ <WH1571> also אֲנִ֖י <WH589> with you myself עִמָּכֶֽם׃ <WH5973> with

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> answered הָעָ֜ם <WH5971> But the people לֹ֣א <WH3808> should not תֵצֵ֗א <WH3318> Thou shalt not go forth כִּי֩ <WH3588> for אִם־ <WH518> if נֹ֨ס <WH5127> for if we flee נָנ֜וּס <WH5127> away לֹא־ <WH3808> not יָשִׂ֧ימוּ <WH7760> appoint אֵלֵ֣ינוּ <WH413> about לֵ֗ב <WH3820> care for וְאִם־ <WH518> if יָמֻ֤תוּ <WH4191> of us die חֶצְיֵ֙נוּ֙ <WH2677> for us neither if half לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not יָשִׂ֤ימוּ <WH7760> appoint אֵלֵ֙ינוּ֙ <WH413> about לֵ֔ב <WH3820> care for כִּֽי־ <WH3588> therefore עַתָּ֥ה <WH6258> now כָמֹ֖נוּ <WH3644> for us but now [thou art] worth עֲשָׂרָ֣ה <WH6235> ten אֲלָפִ֑ים <WH505> thousand וְעַתָּ֣ה <WH6258> now ט֔וֹב <WH2896> of us therefore now [it is] better כִּי־ <WH3588> for תִֽהְיֶה־ <WH1961> become לָּ֥נוּ מֵעִ֖יר <WH5892> us out of the city [לַעְזִיר כ] (לַעְזֹֽור׃ <WH5826> help ק) ס

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said אֲלֵיהֶם֙ <WH413> then הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> And the king אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> Whatever יִיטַ֥ב <WH3190> you best בְּעֵינֵיכֶ֖ם <WH5869> unto them What seemeth אֶעֱשֶׂ֑ה <WH6213> I will do וַיַּעֲמֹ֤ד <WH5975> stood הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> And the king אֶל־ <WH413> about יַ֣ד <WH3027> side הַשַּׁ֔עַר <WH8179> by the gate וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all הָעָם֙ <WH5971> and all the people יָֽצְא֔וּ <WH3381> descend לְמֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> by hundreds וְלַאֲלָפִֽים׃ <WH505> and by thousands

וַיְצַ֣ו <WH6680> commanded הַמֶּ֡לֶךְ <WH4428> And the king אֶת־ <WH853> י֠וֹאָב <WH3097> Joab וְאֶת־ <WH853> אֲבִישַׁ֤י <WH52> and Abishai וְאֶת־ <WH853> אִתַּי֙ <WH863> and Ittai לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying לְאַט־ <WH328> [Deal] gently לִ֖י לַנַּ֣עַר <WH5288> for my sake with the young man לְאַבְשָׁל֑וֹם <WH53> [even] with Absalom וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all הָעָ֣ם <WH5971> And all the people שָׁמְע֗וּ <WH8085> heard בְּצַוֹּ֥ת <WH6680> charge הַמֶּ֛לֶךְ <WH4428> when the king אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַשָּׂרִ֖ים <WH8269> gave all the captains עַל־ <WH5921> and דְּבַ֥ר <WH1697> concerning אַבְשָׁלֽוֹם׃ <WH53> Absalom

וַיֵּצֵ֥א <WH3318> went out הָעָ֛ם <WH5971> So the people הַשָּׂדֶ֖ה <WH7704> into the field לִקְרַ֣את <WH7125> against יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> Israel וַתְּהִ֥י <WH1961> took הַמִּלְחָמָ֖ה <WH4421> and the battle בְּיַ֥עַר <WH3293> was in the wood אֶפְרָֽיִם׃ <WH669> of Ephraim

וַיִּנָּ֤גְפוּ <WH5062> were slain שָׁם֙ <WH8033> Where עַ֣ם <WH5971> Where the people יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel לִפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> before עַבְדֵ֣י <WH5650> the servants דָוִ֑ד <WH1732> of David וַתְּהִי־ <WH1961> become שָׁ֞ם <WH8033> in it הַמַּגֵּפָ֧ה <WH4046> slaughter גְדוֹלָ֛ה <WH1419> and there was there a great בַּיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> that day הַה֖וּא <WH1931> he עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> of twenty אָֽלֶף׃ <WH505> thousand

וַתְּהִי־ <WH1961> become שָׁ֧ם <WH8033> there הַמִּלְחָמָ֛ה <WH4421> For the battle [נָפֹצֵית כ] (נָפֹ֖צֶת <WH6327> break into pieces ק) עַל־ <WH5921> over פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> over the face כָל־ <WH3605> the whole הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> of all the country וַיֶּ֤רֶב <WH7235> more הַיַּ֙עַר֙ <WH3293> and the wood לֶאֱכֹ֣ל <WH398> devoured בָּעָ֔ם <WH5971> people מֵאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> after אָכְלָ֛ה <WH398> devoured הַחֶ֖רֶב <WH2719> than the sword בַּיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> that day הַהֽוּא׃ <WH1931> he

וַיִּקָּרֵא֙ <WH7122> met אַבְשָׁל֔וֹם <WH53> And Absalom לִפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> accept עַבְדֵ֣י <WH5650> the servants דָוִ֑ד <WH1732> of David וְאַבְשָׁל֞וֹם <WH53> And Absalom רֹכֵ֣ב <WH7392> rode עַל־ <WH5921> on הַפֶּ֗רֶד <WH6505> upon a mule וַיָּבֹ֣א <WH935> went הַפֶּ֡רֶד <WH6505> and the mule תַּ֣חַת <WH8478> under שׂוֹבֶךְ֩ <WH7730> under the thick boughs הָאֵלָ֨ה <WH424> oak הַגְּדוֹלָ֜ה <WH1419> of a great וַיֶּחֱזַ֧ק <WH2388> caught hold רֹאשׁ֣וֹ <WH7218> and his head בָאֵלָ֗ה <WH424> of the oak וַיֻּתַּן֙ <WH5414> and he was taken up בֵּ֤ין <WH996> between הַשָּׁמַ֙יִם֙ <WH8064> between the heaven וּבֵ֣ין <WH996> between הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> and the earth וְהַפֶּ֥רֶד <WH6505> and the mule אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> that was תַּחְתָּ֖יו <WH8478> under עָבָֽר׃ <WH5674> that [was] under him went away

וַיַּרְא֙ <WH7200> saw אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> man אֶחָ֔ד <WH259> And a certain וַיַּגֵּ֖ד <WH5046> [it] and told לְיוֹאָ֑ב <WH3097> Joab וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> and said הִנֵּה֙ <WH2009> Behold רָאִ֣יתִי <WH7200> Behold I saw אֶת־ <WH853> אַבְשָׁלֹ֔ם <WH53> Absalom תָּל֖וּי <WH8518> hanged בָּאֵלָֽה׃ <WH424> in an oak

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said יוֹאָ֗ב <WH3097> And Joab לָאִישׁ֙ <WH376> unto the man הַמַּגִּ֣יד <WH5046> that told ל֔וֹ וְהִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> now behold רָאִ֔יתָ <WH7200> him And behold thou sawest וּמַדּ֛וּעַ <WH4069> Why לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not הִכִּית֥וֹ <WH5221> [him] and why didst thou not smite שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> there אָ֑רְצָה <WH776> common וְעָלַ֗י <WH5921> and לָ֤תֶת <WH5414> add לְךָ֙ עֲשָׂ֣רָה <WH6235> thee ten כֶ֔סֶף <WH3701> [shekels] of silver וַחֲגֹרָ֖ה <WH2290> girdle אֶחָֽת׃ <WH259> and a

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said הָאִישׁ֙ <WH376> And the man אֶל־ <WH413> against יוֹאָ֔ב <WH3097> unto Joab [וְלֹא כ] (וְל֨וּא <WH3863> if ק) אָנֹכִ֜י <WH595> I שֹׁקֵ֤ל <WH8254> I should receive עַל־ <WH5921> in כַּפַּי֙ <WH3709> in mine hand אֶ֣לֶף <WH505> a thousand כֶּ֔סֶף <WH3701> [shekels] of silver לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not אֶשְׁלַ֥ח <WH7971> [yet] would I not put forth יָדִ֖י <WH3027> mine hand אֶל־ <WH413> against בֶּן־ <WH1121> son הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> against the king's כִּ֣י <WH3588> in בְאָזְנֵ֜ינוּ <WH241> for in our hearing צִוָּ֣ה <WH6680> charged הַמֶּ֗לֶךְ <WH4428> the king אֹ֠תְךָ <WH853> וְאֶת־ <WH853> אֲבִישַׁ֤י <WH52> thee and Abishai וְאֶת־ <WH853> אִתַּי֙ <WH863> and Ittai לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying שִׁמְרוּ־ <WH8104> Beware מִ֕י <WH4310> me בַּנַּ֖עַר <WH5288> that none [touch] the young man בְּאַבְשָׁלֽוֹם׃ <WH53> Absalom

אֽוֹ־ <WH176> Otherwise עָשִׂ֤יתִי <WH6213> I should have wrought [בְנַפְשֹׁו כ] (בְנַפְשִׁי֙ <WH5315> any ק) שֶׁ֔קֶר <WH8267> falsehood וְכָל־ <WH3605> is no דָּבָ֖ר <WH1697> for there is no matter לֹא־ <WH3808> not יִכָּחֵ֣ד <WH3582> hid מִן־ <WH4480> from הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> from the king וְאַתָּ֖ה <WH859> you תִּתְיַצֵּ֥ב <WH3320> and thou thyself wouldest have set מִנֶּֽגֶד׃ <WH5048> about

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> Then said יוֹאָ֔ב <WH3097> Joab לֹא־ <WH3808> not כֵ֖ן <WH3651> here אֹחִ֣ילָה <WH3176> I may not tarry לְפָנֶ֑יךָ <WH6440> thus with thee וַיִּקַּח֩ <WH3947> And he took שְׁלֹשָׁ֨ה <WH7969> three שְׁבָטִ֜ים <WH7626> darts בְּכַפּ֗וֹ <WH3709> in his hand וַיִּתְקָעֵם֙ <WH8628> and thrust בְּלֵ֣ב <WH3820> them through the heart אַבְשָׁל֔וֹם <WH53> of Absalom עוֹדֶ֥נּוּ <WH5750> was yet חַ֖י <WH2416> while he [was] yet alive בְּלֵ֥ב <WH3820> the midst הָאֵלָֽה׃ <WH424> in the midst of the oak

וַיָּסֹ֙בּוּ֙ <WH5437> compassed about עֲשָׂרָ֣ה <WH6235> And ten נְעָרִ֔ים <WH5288> young men נֹשְׂאֵ֖י <WH5375> that bare כְּלֵ֣י <WH3627> armour יוֹאָ֑ב <WH3097> Joab's וַיַּכּ֥וּ <WH5221> and smote אֶת־ <WH853> אַבְשָׁל֖וֹם <WH53> Absalom וַיְמִיתֻֽהוּ׃ <WH4191> and slew

וַיִּקְח֣וּ <WH3947> And they took אֶת־ <WH853> אַבְשָׁל֗וֹם <WH53> Absalom וַיַּשְׁלִ֨יכוּ <WH7993> and cast אֹת֤וֹ <WH853> בַיַּ֙עַר֙ <WH3293> in the wood אֶל־ <WH413> about הַפַּ֣חַת <WH6354> pit הַגָּד֔וֹל <WH1419> him into a great וַיַּצִּ֧בוּ <WH5324> and laid עָלָ֛יו <WH5921> over גַּל־ <WH1530> heap אֲבָנִ֖ים <WH68> of stones גָּד֣וֹל <WH1419> great מְאֹ֑ד <WH3966> a very וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> upon him and all Israel נָ֖סוּ <WH5127> fled אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> every one [לְאֹהֵלֹו כ] (לְאֹהָלָֽיו׃ <WH168> tent ק) ס

וְאַבְשָׁלֹ֣ם <WH53> Now Absalom לָקַ֗ח <WH3947> had taken וַיַּצֶּב־ <WH5324> and reared up ל֤וֹ [בְחַיָו כ] (בְחַיָּיו֙ <WH2416> age ק) אֶת־ <WH853> מַצֶּ֙בֶת֙ <WH4678> for himself a pillar אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which בְּעֵֽמֶק־ <WH6010> dale הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> which [is] in the king's כִּ֤י <WH3588> for אָמַר֙ <WH559> for he said אֵֽין־ <WH369> have לִ֣י בֵ֔ן <WH1121> I have no son בַּעֲב֖וּר <WH5668> because of הַזְכִּ֣יר <WH2142> in remembrance שְׁמִ֑י <WH8034> to keep my name וַיִּקְרָ֤א <WH7121> and he called לַמַּצֶּ֙בֶת֙ <WH4678> the pillar עַל־ <WH5921> after שְׁמ֔וֹ <WH8034> after his own name וַיִּקָּ֤רֵא <WH7121> and it is called לָהּ֙ יַ֣ד <WH3027> place אַבְשָׁלֹ֔ם <WH53> Absalom's עַ֖ד <WH5704> against הַיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> unto this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> to this ס

וַאֲחִימַ֤עַץ <WH290> Ahimaaz בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son צָדוֹק֙ <WH6659> of Zadok אָמַ֔ר <WH559> Then said אָר֣וּצָה <WH7323> Let me now run נָּ֔א <WH4994> Please וַאֲבַשְּׂרָ֖ה <WH1319> tidings אֶת־ <WH853> הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> the king כִּי־ <WH3588> for שְׁפָט֥וֹ <WH8199> hath avenged יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> how that the LORD מִיַּ֥ד <WH3027> the hand אֹיְבָֽיו׃ <WH341> enemy
